# particleVelocityVariation

**Instance Property**

The range, in units per second, of randomized initial particle speeds. Animatable.

## Declaration

```swift
var particleVelocityVariation: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting a nonzero value for this property randomizes the effect of the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleVelocity] property. SceneKit randomly adjusts the initial speed of each particle by up to half the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleVelocityVariation] value. For example, if the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleVelocity] value is `10.0` units per second and the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/particleVelocityVariation] value is `5.0` units per second, newly spawned particles have random velocities between `7.5` and `12.5` units per second.

The default value is `0.0` units per second, specifying no randomization.

You can animate changes to this property’s value. See [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/animating-scenekit-content].

## Managing Particle Motion

- **particleAngle**: The rotation angle, in degrees, of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleAngleVariation**: The range, in degrees of randomized initial particle angles. Animatable.
- **particleVelocity**: The initial speed, in units per second, for newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleAngularVelocity**: The initial spin rate, in degrees per second, of newly spawned particles. Animatable.
- **particleAngularVelocityVariation**: The range, in degrees per second, of randomized initial angular velocities for particles. Animatable.
- **particleLifeSpan**: The duration, in seconds, for which each particle is rendered before being removed from the scene. Animatable.
- **particleLifeSpanVariation**: The range, in seconds, of randomized particle life spans. Animatable.
